programme.desc: Mengisahkan sepasukan pegawai polis yang menjalankan tugas menyelesaikan kes-kes jenayah yang berlaku dalam dunia korporat dan juga masyarakat tempatan.

programme.desc: Sebuah kisah benar dalam masyarakat Bugis yang berlatarkan tahun 1950-an. Ia mengisahkan Waliq, seorang nelayan yang meninggalkan isteri dan anaknya untuk belayar.

programme.title: Healthy Breakfast
programme.desc: Sebuah majalah kesihatan yang berkongsi tips-tips penjagaan diri dan kecantikan dalaman.

programme.title: #OBB (Orang Baik Baik)
programme.desc: Majalah yang memaparkan kehidupan dan aktiviti seseorang atau sekumpulan warga yang layak diiktiraf sebagai OBB iaitu Orang Baik-Baik berlandaskan aktiviti kemasyarakatan atau kebajikan yang diusahakan.

programme.title: Embok Belum Terbakar

programme.title: Megatik
programme.desc: Kisah persahabatan antara budak lelaki bernama Mac bersama rakan-rakan termasuk Hantoo Solo (makhluk asing) dan robot Ted yang jatuh ke bumi.

programme.title: Ejen 123
programme.desc: Kisah sekumpulan tiga ejen yang bertugas membantu membanteras penyakit yang menyerang manusia. Mereka juga memberi pendedahan tentang penyakit-penyakit berkenaan dari segi pengertian, punca, cara rawatan.

programme.desc: Mengisahkan sepasukan pegawai polis yang menjalankan tugas menyelesaikan kes-kes jenayah yang berlaku dalam dunia korporat dan juga masyarakat tempatan.

programme.title: Justice Major League
programme.desc: Kisah penyiasatan pelbagai kes oleh seorang peguam wanita muda bersama dua orang penyiasat persendirian. Mereka menyewa satu unit pejabat dan bekerjasama untuk menyelesaikan pelbagai kes.

programme.title: Berita Mandarin
programme.desc: Ikuti berita yang memaparkan perkembangan terkini dan semasa termasuk berita ekonomi dan kewangan.

programme.title: Galeri Nasional Mandarin 2020
programme.desc: Rancangan berbentuk majalah berbahasa Mandarin yang mengupas kegiatan semasa masyarakat.

programme.title: Update@Noon
programme.desc: News On 2, brings you the latest news of national interest and trending international issues.

programme.title: Matahari Cerah Lagi
programme.desc: Suha, seorang wanita yang sentiasa bernasib malang. Dia diseksa oleh ibu tiri selepas kematian bapanya. Kemudian, soal harta keluarga pula dibangkitkan.

programme.title: Lara Syakila
programme.desc: Syakila seorang gadis bangsawan telah dinafikan haknya untuk bercinta dengan jejaka kampung bernama Adam.

programme.title: Sekuriti
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat, Ajay dan Ganesh yang terpaksa bekerja sebagai Sekuriti selepas menanggur lama kerana memilih jurusan yang tidak popular sewaktu mengambil Ijazah.

programme.title: Vellai Kavasam
programme.desc: Kisah semangat setia kawan tiga orang atlet Karate Do yang cuba mencatat nama dalam sukan seni mempertahankan diri negara.

programme.title: Vetri Unggal Vaasalil
programme.desc: Rancangan majalah yang memberi inspirasi khasnya buat kaum wanita untuk lebih maju dan berjaya dalam pelbagai aspek kehidupan.

programme.title: Balle Balle Chakde
programme.desc: Rancangan hiburan dan informasi dengan pelbagai segmen mengenai industri hiburan tempatan dan dunia perfileman Bollywood.

programme.title: Detective Dee

programme.title: NCIS S14 - EP 9
programme.desc: The NCIS team investigates a series of escalating threats against congresswoman Jenna Flemming, while Director Vance oversees temporary protection detail.

programme.title: Tricked (Canada) - EP 10
programme.desc: Tricked Canada is a high-energy family series that pulls the rabbit out of the hat and flips it on its ear. It drags magic off the stage and onto the streets as master magician Eric LeClerc goes undercover with hidden cameras, posing in a variety of guises such as store clerk, waiter or sales assistant to pull super sneaky pranks on unsuspecting people.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Earth - EP 3
programme.desc: This series explores our planet with the same sense of awe and wonder normally reserved for alien worlds. Computer graphics, visual analogies and expert scientists combine to reveal amazing, little-known facts and bring a stunning new perspective to the world you think you know.

programme.title: Euromaxx - EP 128
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Eat The Week - EP 2
programme.desc: Coming to the rescue of 10 families who are facing universal culinary conundrums - whether that's eating the same old dishes every week, feeding fussy eaters or being short on time - Simon has the answer. Featuring inspiring recipes that are quick and simple to follow, stunning food photography and fascinating foodie stories with reporter and cook Michela Chiappa - Eat The Week is the delicious feel good food show for all the family.

programme.title: The Dr Oz Show 10 - EP 146
programme.desc: (Encore) Women conned by a rogue cosmetic surgeon who botched surgeries and left them disfigured; what undercover cameras caught in illegal cosmetic surgery clinics.

programme.title: Jack S1 - EP 0039 & 0040
programme.desc: Jack is a human-like terrestrial from Beano, a small asteroid that orbits the earth. Unbeknownst to all parents on Earth, he tunes in with CHIP's help to search for and monitor little mysteries for Earth's children. Aided by the "Outer-Net", Jack with his 2 sidekicks - CHIP and Rocket, the goofy little dog, embark on numerous adventures to unravel those mysteries.

programme.title: Welcome To The Wayne S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Ansi Molina moves into the Wayne, an apartment building filled with strange and unusual things labeled as "Wayne Phenomena". He befriends siblings Olly and Saraline Timbers as they learn the mysteries of the Wayne and protect the outside world while contending with a spy cell seeking to exploit apartment's supernatural aspects for their own nefarious ends.

Will Joel be able to distinguish his father's dish? Stay tuned to find out! (重)资深艺人朱厚任的二公子Joel朱哲伟，是本地演艺圈的后起之秀，为何这对父子档的身边，总跟着2位小朋友？而他们一家人最爱吃的家常菜，又有什么特别呢？还有2位厨艺高超的大厨，也会来模仿厚任的一道鱼料理，到底喜欢下厨的哲伟，能否吃出爸爸煮的味道呢？.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 91
programme.desc: (R) Da Li enters 119 Pizza hurriedly. Jie Jie notices his mental disability and believes in an instant, what Da Gong told her previously. She informs Da Gong to take him home. Unknown to the rest, Tian Cheng calls the police. (PG)(重)大利忽然来到119 Pizza，天成要报警，被洁洁阻止。洁洁果然发现大利智力有问题，加上他一身脏兮兮的，马上相信大功所说。她烘了Pizza给大利吃，并通知大功前来带大利回去。大功感激洁洁，天成却暗中报警，准备来个一网打尽。.

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Chinatown is Singapore's largest historic district, embedded with traditional Chinese culture. But did you know that the famous Thian Hock Keng temple once held the calligraphy bestowed by a Qing dynasty Emperor? What unique murals lies within the vicinity of Chinatown? Let's head down to Chinatown to explore! (重)新加坡的牛车水历史悠久，是大家熟知的华人社区。但你们是否知道，天福宫里头曾经藏有清朝皇帝亲自题字的匾额吗？牛车水一带又到底藏匿了哪几幅有关早期新加坡人生活的壁画呢？跟随我们的两位搜密组员的脚步，好好了解牛车水！.

programme.title: 健康那些事 Get Fit With Me - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Let's work out even when we are home alone! The sport experts will share exercise tips and routine by providing step by step tutorial. (重)运动 (Exercise) 即使需要减少群体活动，自己一人同样能运动！运动达人们传授各种适合乐龄人士的运动，教大家不断 keep fit 强身健体。.

programme.title: 三个愿望 Three Wishes - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Zhao Yaozong is a middle aged man who is an assistant horse trainer. As things do not go well at work, his wife, Shan Mei and three children are always worried about him. When the whole family goes to Kusu Island to make wishes, he meets an elderly woman who sells him tissue packets with wishing coins inside. She says they can make his wishes come true. Shanmei encourages Yaozong to make a wish with the coin and a miracle happens! (PG)(重)中年汉赵耀宗在马场当助理驯马师，工作不如意，三个孩子也总是让妻子善美操心。一次全家到龟屿岛上许愿，一个卖纸巾老婆婆向他兜售装有"愿望钱币"的纸巾，表示可以让他实现愿望。善美鼓励耀宗向"愿望钱币"许愿，奇迹竟然发生！.

programme.title: 行医 The Oath - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Guo En accompanies Minfei for treatment while Dewei tries to contact a professor based in Germany, in the hope of finding a treatment for her. Minfei develops side effects as a result of her chemo but continues to keep herself busy at work. Her patients lose trust in her after finding out about her condition. (重)国恩陪伴敏妃接受化疗，德伟则忙碌地联络德国教授，希望可以找到治疗敏妃绝症的方法。敏妃因为化疗副作用而掉发、呕吐等，但仍坚持继续上班，让自己没有时间乱想。不料病人得知敏妃正接受化疗，却对她的医术有所怀疑。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 349
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 下一站。遇见 Hello Miss Driver - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Yi Yang returns to the bus company to assist Chen Xi, but both of them always get into arguments. Yu Zhu feels that since Wen Liang is gone, the money he left her is useless. Hence she starts to give the money to lonely elderly. Zhong Da realises Yu Zhu's abnormal action, and manipulates Yu Zhu to give away all her shares to become truly carefree... (PG)(重)一阳重回巴士公司，协助晨曦，但两人经常起冲突。玉珠觉得文良不在了，他留给自己的钱也没有用，开始把钱拿去派送给孤苦伶仃的老人。仲达发现玉珠举止不正常，心生歹念，怂恿玉珠把拥有的股份也送走，才能真正无牵无挂……。.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 121
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 40
programme.desc: (Part 2) Weijia confesses his love for Bei Er once again, but is rejected. Weijia returns to Portugal for work, and comes across the musical that he missed watching with Bei Er. Bei Er is in a dilemma when she receives the invitation for the musical. (PG)(第40集下)(大结局)围家再次向贝儿表白爱意，要求重新开始，贝儿却认为他值得找个更好的而拒绝。围家到葡萄牙处理生意，看见当日贝儿失约的音乐剧在当地上演，赠送机票请贝儿赴约，贝儿心中忐忑…….

programme.title: 小偏方大拆解 Health Hacks - EP 5
programme.desc: Skin is the largest organ of the human body, so any skin problems should not be taken lightly. Skin problems will not only affect the sufferer's self-confidence but also cause inconvenience in life. This episode, let's join Kym and experts to explore on various folk remedies to treat skin diseases. 皮肤是人体最大的器官，皮肤问题不容忽视，皮肤一旦出现问题，不仅会影响患者的自信心，也会对其生活带来不便。到底坊间流传着多少治疗皮肤病的小偏方呢？在这一集的节目里，鐘琴将请来专家们逐一拆解。.

programme.title: 星期二特写-- 极限人生 Tuesday Report - No Limit - EP 1
programme.desc: In love with the speed and adrenaline rush of racing, 21-year-old Aleef and 11-year-old Ryan dream about becoming professional racers. Undeterred by the high cost of racing, Aleef access his dream through e-racing to earn a spot on the tracks. And what lessons behold a young racer on the mean tracks of racing? 在赛道上奔驰的速度和激情，让21岁的Aleef和11岁的陈启龙对赛车情有独钟。在新加坡，赛车活动并不普及，所需花费不小；Aleef怎么透过参加电竞赛车比赛，争取登上实际卡丁车赛道？11岁的小小赛车手又如何能在充满变数的赛道上快速成长？.

programme.title: 爱...没有距离 Loving You - EP 7
programme.desc: Yu Ting feels uneasy that Chen Shi's family is going on an overseas trip; she gets into a car accident. Mr Pang, who was with Yu Ting, informs Chen Shi. Chen Shi rushes to the hospital and hugs Yu Ting tightly, Mr Pang is stunned at the sight. Yu Ting chooses not to repress her feelings any longer and decides to stay beside Chen Shi no matter what. (PG)玉婷因陈石全家出国而心神不宁，结果发生车祸，与她在一起的Mr Pang立刻通知陈石。陈石赶到医院，与受伤的玉婷情不自禁紧紧相拥，Mr Pang看得目瞪口呆。玉婷不再压抑自己的感情，决定无论如何都要留在陈石身边。.

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Tianshen and Weixin fly to Okinawa to look for Zhuojing. Weixin bumps into Nana and is enchanted by her smile. Tianshen and Weixin saw Zhuojing who is crippled after an accident. Tianshen and Zhuojing get married in the end. (PG13-性相关语)(重)天生与威信飞往冲绳岛找卓静。威信遇见娜娜，被她迷人的笑容吸引。 天生与威信发现卓静，得知因车祸而残废,天生卓静最终结合。.

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 28
programme.desc: (R) Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (PG)(重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.title: 爱玩客之移动厨房 2019 IWalker - Moving Kitchen 2019 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Follow Li Yi and Yan Yong Lie as they embark on a tour round Taiwan whipping up yummy cuisines and hearty desserts. (重)李易和颜永烈带着全新打造的五星級移动厨房走遍台湾，边走边煮。本周，李易和颜永烈登上有着最佳美食游轮之称的公主游轮，品尝米其林主厨设计的法式料理，结合台湾味的经典粤菜，参加一年一度的澳洲国庆派对，还要前进游轮中央厨房，揭开美食背后的秘密。最后接受主厨考验，做出指定料理给船长品尝。.

She encourages him to believe in his own ability and not simply rely on the wishing coins. (PG)(重)耀宗的马儿Power Boy在节目中失控，竟意外地让耀宗成了驯马英雄，保住了差点失去的工作。但他在马场还是受到另一驯马师的无理对待，他想再次以许愿来解决问题，善美反对，鼓励他要相信自己的能力，不要再依赖"愿望钱币"。.

programme.title: 行医 The Oath - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Dewei is jealous and throws a fit after discovering that Minfei is taking Guo En's Chinese medicine. Minfei informs Guo En about this. When Guo En feels that Dewei is biased against him, Minfei feels that Guo En is too sensitive. Dewei wants Minfei to go Germany with him to seek treatment, Minfei turns him down using her dad as an excuse. Dewei is jealous and angry with Guo En when he finds out that he and not her dad is the main reason why Minfei rejected him. (重)德伟发现敏妃在服用国恩的中药，嫉妒得大发雷霆。敏妃把这事告知国恩，国恩认为德伟对自己有成见，敏妃觉得国恩太敏感。德伟希望敏妃可以同到德国治疗，敏妃表示不想离开父亲，其实她真正在乎的人是国恩，令德伟更痛恨国恩。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 350
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 下一站。遇见 Hello Miss Driver - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Under Zhong Da's manipulation, Yu Zhu transfers all the shares to him. Yi Yang plans to confess to Chen Xi. However, Zhong Da appears to claim that Yuan Cheng Bus Company belongs to him now with the legal entity documents. Chen Xi and Yi Yang are shocked. Chen Xi feels guilty towards Wen Liang when she could not change the situation. Yi Yang is heartbroken when he sees Chen Xi feeling helpless. (PG)(重)玉珠在仲达怂恿下，把自己名下的股权转让给他。一阳打算跟晨曦表白，仲达突然来到，拿出股份转让书，指远程巴士已经属他所有，晨曦和一阳感错愕。晨曦无力挽回，难过又愧对文良。一阳看到晨曦无助的样子，心痛不已。.

programme.title: 白色强人 Big White Duel - EP 1
programme.desc: (Part 1) Tang Ming's ball game buddies get food poisoning. Tang Ming and his disciple send them to the nearby Marshall Paxton Hospital for treatment. As a doctor himself, Tang Ming wants to help out when he sees the A & E Department busy tending to patients. However, he is not allowed to cross the line as he is a doctor from another hospital. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(首播)(第1集上) 唐明的球友们食物中毒，他与徒弟把他们送到附近的明成北医院急症室求医。见到急症室忙得不可开交时，身为医生的唐明很想帮忙，但因他是别间医院的医生所以不能越界。.

programme.title: A Taste Of Festival - EP 12
programme.desc: One is considered a year older after eating tangyuan on Winter Solstice Festival. Host visits home chefs to try out Laba congee, Fuzhou and Hakka tangyuan and also learns about the traditional Winter Solstice dishes in Northeast China and Korea. Chef Thomas brings on an innovative tangyuan dish. 冬至吃汤圆，吃了长一岁。主持人拜访家厨，品尝福州汤圆、客家咸汤圆还有腊月限定腊八粥；一起认识各国的冬至食俗，中国东北吃饺子汤、韩国的红豆粥。名厨蔡雪鸿带来创新的一品汤圆，三色三味，吃出满满的节庆风味。.

programme.title: 爱...没有距离 Loving You - EP 8
programme.desc: Lin Li has a face-off with Yu Ting. Yu Ting tries to taunt Lin Li by telling her how well she and Chen Shi suit each other - working well and having similar interests. However, Lin Li tells Yu Ting about her marriage of 15 years with Chen Shi, and that the two have definitely been through more than Chen Shi and Yu Ting have; Yu Ting argues that all these are in the past....... (PG)林俐找玉婷摊牌，玉婷告诉林俐她和陈石有多契合，工作上合作无间，私底下则品味相近，志趣相投，有意向林俐示威。林俐却说她和陈石结婚15年，两人经历过的事情肯定比玉婷多，玉婷说那些都已经是过去式……。.

programme.title: 寻花探草 Sr 1 Garden Of Treasure S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: "Garden Of Treasure " is a documentary on the healing functions and botanical characteristics of wild flowers and herbs which can also be used to cook simple and delicious flower dishes. 《寻花探草》是以药草拍摄为主的纪录片，介绍他们心目中的百搭花草，逐一分享花草的药疗功能和植物特性, 也化成一道道简单好味的花草料理。.

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper S2 - EP 6

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 29
programme.desc: (R) Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (PG)(重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.title: 好好说 慢慢讲 Say It ! - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) The finale episode of Say It! where Vivian and Enlai's language skills are finally put to the ultimate test! With their training for the past episodes, can they finally overcome their language barriers and host an English and Mandarin programme? (重)（最后一集）当赖怡伶说英语，蔡恩来又说华语时，会发生什么笑料？最后一集的《好好说 慢慢讲》的终极挑战就是让两人各自参与主持英语和华语节目。怡伶和蔡恩能完成挑战，顺利成为双语兼通的主持人吗？.

(重)越战期间，大批美军到菲律宾驻扎，并和当地女性在合法婚姻体制外，生下许多混血儿；美军父亲完成任务后回国，却丢下单亲的孩子，在歧视、仇恨和贫困中成长。这群美亚后裔而今也年过半百，他们在过着怎样的生活.

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 1

programme.title: 已读不回 Blue Tick - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Zhou Daowen was frightened after receiving a message from the deceased Fangxing. He told Sidong and Nianxia that Fangxing died in a car accident on the way to the airport to fetch him. Daowen was no longer a suspect. Sidong and Nianxia went to look for Fangxings girlfriend He Chuen and Peng Xiyu. The three women could tell they all liked Fangxing. Sidong realized his former friend was a playboy and convinced Nianxia to let go of the past... Sidong and Nianxia went back to Hong Kong to look for the other funeral attendees, but bumped into one of Fangxing's former girlfriends, Li Kaixin, who sneaked into his house to steal money. Li Kaixin was shocked to find out Fangxing was online, crossing herself out from the suspect list. Sidong and Nianxia met up with Hu Deying and Song Haoran, Song Haoran knew what they were there for instantly, and warned them not to investigate further. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)原来胆小怕事的周稻文，收到方行的讯息，被吓傻了。思冬与念夏从稻文口中得知，方行当年赶往机场接稻文而发生交通意外丧生。稻文没可疑，思冬与念夏找方行女友何楚恩，及另一出席者彭喜愉，三个女人互相都看得出对方喜欢方行。思冬发现好兄弟竟是花心郎，替念夏不值，劝其放下。念夏决定回香港继续调查，思冬跟随。 思冬与念夏回港约见其他葬礼出席者，但竟在方行家遇上其临时女友李凯欣上来偷钱。李凯欣对方行「上线」反应奇大，似乎不是制造「已读不回」的人。思冬与念夏再约见了胡德英和宋皓然，宋皓然不待二人道明来意，已知为了「已读不回」，警告二人不要再追查。念夏认定「就是他」，撇下思冬，独自跟踪宋皓然。.

programme.title: 非常监狱 Extraordinary Prisons - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) What is a prison without bars? Iwahig Prison in Palawan, Philippines is one of the largest open-air prisons in the world, with an area of almost a third of Singapore. Over 2000 prisoners roam free within the compound, and a select few even live in their own homes with their families. (重)“无围墙的监狱”还能称得上是监狱吗？位于菲律宾巴拉望岛的Iwahig监狱，是世界上最大的开放式监狱之一，面积将近新加坡的三分之一。超过两千名囚犯能在监狱范围自由活动，甚至有些和家人住在自己盖的楼房中。.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 9
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Shizhen brings Taijun to the hospital to visit Wancai and introduces Taijun to her family. Youjing looks down on Taijun's background and is certain that Taijun is making use of Shizhen to climb up the social ladder. programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 2
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Because there are 2 people with the same name - Wu Haiying, Daojing mistook Haiying as his runaway girlfriend, pretty Wu Haiying. programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 3

Shina tries to win Xiuchang over by telling him untrue stories about how she is treated badly at home as she is an illegitimate daughter. The kind-hearted Xiuchang graciously accepts Shina into the family. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)度英和世娜的进展神速，秀昌担心单纯的度英受骗，要度英提防世娜。世娜为了尽快跟度英结婚，夺取洁姿美妆的商业机密，故意在秀昌面前扮可怜，令善良的秀昌接纳她。.

programme.desc: Eating healthy goes a long way, watch on to find out how to incorporate this green diet smoothie into your meals. 想补充养分、膳食纤维同时维持身段？不妨喝蔬果饮料当代餐吧！.

programme.title: 身在异乡非异客 Strangers At Home - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) The British colonial period in the 19th century saw many South Asians arriving in Hong Kong and contributing to society through the years. Some have returned home; others call this land home. As they look different, their integration journey hasn't always been smooth. Our host examines their lives. (重)早在19世纪就已经有许多南亚裔人随着英国殖民政府来到香港，也曾经为建立香港这个大都市作出贡献（警探等的职务）。许多南亚裔人士落叶归根回到了印度与巴基斯坦，也有许多决定落地生根在香港建立家庭。他们虽然土生土长，但因为黝黑的肤色，深邃的五官，始终很难融入当地社会。这一集的节目将会走访不同职业的香港人，看看这群香港南亚裔的道地港式生活。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) In South Korean history, there is a pioneer female royal doctor called "Da Chang-Jin", who created superb imperial cuisine for the king. As host Michelle Chia savours the tales of Da Chang-Jin's life, she discovers the delectable and nutritious tastes of these old royal recipes. (重)韩国史书上记载的首位女御医大长今，熔古铸今，创造出超群绝伦的宫廷御膳。珍馐美馔，不仅是一国之君调理养身的基石，更是舌尖上的一大欢飨。遵循《大长今》故事细腻的笔触，谢韵仪将探索韩国宫廷御膳料理的奥妙。.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 10
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Taijun arranges to meet up with Na-yan. He is shocked to see Na-yan with a little girl. Taijun does not know what to do next when he finds out from Manting that the little girl is his daughter. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)泰俊安排跟娜妍见面，却发现娜妍带着一名小女孩赴约。泰俊质问满婷，发现满婷故意要娜妍向他隐瞒新星的出生。泰俊不知如何是好。.

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 3
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Haiying's parents decide to sever their ties with Haiying due to her strange behaviour and think she is crazy. Haiying and Daojing bump into each other in the bar, and she informs him about the wedding cancellation, making Daojing feel more guilty. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海英的行为异常，海英的爸妈决定抛弃海英因他们认为女儿疯了。海英和道京在酒吧里相遇后，海英首次对别人说出了自己被悔婚的真相，弄得道京更内疚。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 5
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Jiaying plucks up her courage to tell Zhenghan about her liking for him. Zhenghan rejects Jiaying as he does not want to enter into a relationship with a client. The discouraged Jiaying stays at home for two whole days to sort out her feelings. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)佳英鼓起勇气跟正韩表白，但正韩说不希望跟客户牵扯感情，因此拒绝佳英。难过得佳英在家睡了两天两夜后才振作起来。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 6
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Jiaying hears from Zhengbin that Zhenghan was badly hurt in his last relationship. Jiaying tells Zhenghan that she will wait for him to recover before they start a new relationship. Zhenghan is shocked by Jiaying's gestures. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)佳英从正彬那儿听说正韩之前受到很严重的背叛。佳英尝试了解正韩的心情，告诉正韩她会等他走出伤痛才谈感情。正韩惊讶。.

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 10
programme.desc: Taiwanese indigenous children's choir VOX Nativa has made waves around the world with their aboriginal music. By making their voices heard, the conductor hopes to bring about positive change in the lives of these children from poverty-stricken native communities and preserve their culture as well. 发迹于玉山下的原声童声合唱团让全世界听见了台湾的声音。在万人瞩目的背后，却是一场深具意义的偏 乡教育实验。指挥马彼得想借着假日音乐学校，翻转部落复制贫穷的命运。他的教育理念真的能够改变部 落，为孩子们带来幸福吗？.

programme.title: 皇后的品格 The Last Empress - EP 34
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Li He goes back to the island to rescue those prisoners who are kept captive by En'lan. En'lan kills Li He without knowing that she is shooting at her own son. (PG13-暴力镜头)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)李赫伪装到听琴岛上搭救那些被太后囚禁的人，自己却被恩兰的手下逼到死角。恩兰不知道搭救囚犯的人是李赫，结果亲手开枪杀死李赫。.

programme.title: Berita Tengah Malam
programme.desc: Berita Tengah Malam yang memaparkan perkembangan terkini, isu-isu semasa dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Biz Malaysia
programme.desc: Dapatkan maklumat-maklumat semasa dan terkini mengenai ekonomi Malaysia dalam Biz Malaysia.

programme.title: Pastikan Sahih
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan bual bicara santai untuk berkongsi maklumat yang benar dan sahih serta mencari kebenaran tentang berita-berita yang tular di media sosial.

programme.title: Ruwa Seni Bina Islam
programme.desc: Memaparkan keindahan masjid dan surau di negara kita dari segi hiasan luaran dan dalaman. Turut menyentuh dan berkongsi tentang sejarah pembinaan masjid dan surau.

programme.title: Langit Biru
programme.desc: Program dokumentari yang menyaksikan sejarah dan lokasi-lokasi menarik di Indonesia.

programme.title: Renjer
programme.desc: Saksikan tugas & peranan renjer yang bertanggungjawab melaksana dan memantau kawasan rizab hutan hujan tropika.

programme.title: Kenali Sempadan
programme.desc: Bersama Arjaa Lee mengenali dan menjelajahi sempadan negeri-negeri di Malaysia, antaranya Sempadan antara Negeri Selangor dan Pahang, Sempadan antara Negeri Selangor dan Negeri Sembilan dan lain-lain. programme.title: Breaking New Ground
programme.desc: With an ever-growing scene, get to know how breaking became such a movement in India. The Red Bull BC One World Final will be held in India for the first time ever. With an ever-growing scene, get to know how breaking became such a movement in India.

programme.title: The Green Cape
programme.sub-title: Skating in Senegal and Cape Verde
programme.desc: Red Bull athlete Zion Wright debuts on a skateboarding trip, going from Senegal to the Cape Verde islands. One for the record books, this first-ever pro skateboarding tour of Senegal and the Cape Verde islands produced all the incredible visuals and culture clashes which make for an unforgettable skate trip.

programme.title: Away Days
programme.desc: Showcasing their superstar team, adidas present a skateboarding saga, which was three years in the making. The first full-length skate film from adidas is an epic saga of life on the road. With a team featuring Mark Gonzales, Dennis Busenitz, Silas Baxter-Neal, Alec Majerus and more, this crew bring next-level skating to more than 100 cities worldwide.

programme.title: Ride: All In Red Bull Edition
programme.sub-title: The best dirt bike riders push to new heights
programme.desc: The best dirt bike riders from supercross, motocross, desert, FMX and endurocross push themselves to the top. Watch some of the best dirt bike riders, including Jeffrey Herlings, Jorge Prado, Marvin Musquin and Cody Webb, push themselves to be fitter, stronger and faster in pursuit of the top step of the podium.

programme.title: How to choose freeride skis
programme.desc: Backcountry skier Paddy Graham shares what to look for when you're trying to choose the right freeride skis. Backcountry skier Paddy Graham shares what to look for when you're trying to choose the right freeride skis, from width, to length and binding Graham gives the details on how to pick them.

programme.title: How to find powder
programme.desc: Freeskier Paddy Graham lives to shred powder and shares his best practices to find prime powder. Freeskier Paddy Graham lives to shred powder and shares his best practices to find prime powder, from what sites to check, to finding the right resort, how to read a weather report and more.

programme.title: How to do the perfect turn
programme.desc: Paddy Graham shows you how to get creative with fresh powder – follow his tips to show off some new skills. The UK's Paddy Graham shows you how to get creative with fresh powder – find out what to do as well as what not to do. Follow Paddy's top tips and start showing off your new skills on the slopes.

programme.title: Katowice
programme.desc: Here’s how Poland's IEM Katowice made its mark on esports and changed the city's image. Michal 'Carmac' Blicharz explains how the annual IEM Katowice gaming event at the Spodek arena came about and details how an industrial city known for its mines and steelworks changed its image.

programme.title: Istanbul
programme.desc: Hear from up-and-coming Turkish gamers about why Turkey is a worthy competitor in the gaming world. Istanbul is a beautiful city where a myriad of cultures come together. It's also the scene of a rising pro gaming community. Hear from up-and-coming Turkish gamers about why Turkey is a worthy competitor in the gaming world.

programme.title: Coldwater Journal
programme.desc: Follow surfer and film-maker Ben Weiland on his decade-long journey to explore the world's coastlines. Follow surfer and film-maker Ben Weiland on his decade-long journey to explore the most frigid, desolate and starkly beautiful coastlines on the planet. Weiland is always on the search for perfect waves and high adventure.

programme.title: The Kelly Rowland Edition
programme.desc: Kelly Rowland and producers collaborate to share an artistic journey of music writing and recording. Go behind the scenes of a creative musical journey as a team of songwriters and producers write and record three tracks with superstar singer and artist Kelly Rowland at Red Bull Studios Los Angeles.

programme.title: Back to the Bowl
programme.desc: Explore the history of one of the world's most iconic skate spots as told by the riders who made it famous. The beachside skatepark in Marseilles is one of the most famous skateboard spots in the world. Retrace its history with the skateboard legends who've shredded the bowl over the past 25 years and find out what makes it such an iconic spot.

programme.title: Alptopia
programme.desc: The more skier Markus Eder has travelled, the more he saw the treasure that hides in the Alps. After travelling the world for the past six years, skier Markus Eder has gained a lot of experience, learning from the professional skiers he skied with. But the more he travelled, the more he saw the treasure that hides in the Alps in Europe.

programme.title: Game Loading
programme.desc: Disrupting the big-budget games industry, indie developers have impacted the world of video games in a big way. Explore the world of indie game developers – their craft, their games, their dreams and the way that these small teams of artists and programmers have forever changed not only video game culture, but the world at large.

programme.title: Nicole Moudaber
programme.desc: Meet Nicole Moudaber, the DJ with a double life. Meet Nicole Moudaber, the DJ with a double life. When this Nigeria-born, London-based DJ and producer isn’t travelling the world performing at the world’s greatest clubs and festivals, Nicole likes to spend her spare time driving racing cars.

programme.title: Menno Van Gorp
programme.desc: When B-Boy Menno Van Gorp isn’t travelling the world proving his skills he spends his time creating art. When B-Boy and tracksuit entrepreneur Menno Van Gorp isn’t travelling the world proving his award-winning brand of fluid and innovative breakdancing skills, he spends much of his time creating artwork in his design studio in Rotterdam, the Netherlands.

programme.title: The Journey Begins
programme.desc: Six friends prepare for the danger and excitement of kayaking unexplored territory in Michoacan, Mexico. Michoacan State in western Mexico promises to be a kayaker's paradise for six adventurous friends who look to take on its challenging rivers. But their preparation in Veracruz quickly reminds them just how dangerous this wilderness sport can be.

programme.title: Scouting Uncharted Waters
programme.desc: Kayaker buds Joel, Rafa, Dane, Kieran, Seth, and Juan embrace the unkown as they finally arrive in Michoacan. The guys spend their first days in Michoacan scouting unexplored waterways and jungles and encountering dangerous situations before they even get in a boat. If it's this hard on land and in town, will Michaocan's rivers prove to be too much to take?

programme.title: Bring A Rope
programme.desc: The Rio Cajones lives up to its name as the guys ride rapids and rappel rock walls in the canyon for two days. The kayaking adventure of a lifetime continues. After an aerial scout, the guys realize they must rappel down a sheer canyon wall because the waterfall is just too dangerous to go over. But at the bottom of the rope they find their best run yet.

programme.title: Motive
programme.desc: Enjoy the effortless style and progressive riding of six MTB pros combined with cutting edge film-making. Enjoy effortless style and progressive riding combined with cutting edge film-making as pro mountain bikers Dylan Dunkerton, Curtis Robinson, Matty Miles, Finn Iles, Garret Mecham and Matt Hunter share what drives their passion for their sport.
